snippet: Officials in Dallas reported that a patient with Zika virus was infected after having sex with an ill individual who had returned from a country where Zika was circulating.
abstract: Dallas County Health and Human Services Dept reports patient was infected with Zika virus after having sex with someone who had returned from Venezuela, where virus is circulating; news will likely complicate efforts to contain virus and has prompted Centers for Disease Control to amend its advice to those traveling to Zika-affected regions.

byline.original: By DONALD G. McNEIL Jr. and SABRINA TAVERNISE

lead_paragraph: Officials in Dallas reported that a patient with Zika virus was infected after having sex with an ill individual who had returned from a country where Zika was circulating.

headline.main: Zika Infection Transmitted by Sex Reported in Texas
headline.print_headline: Dallas Reports a Case of Zika Spread by Sex

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
